name: Promise Pro Super Deluxe Cinematic Edition
name_original: Promise Pro Super Deluxe Cinematic Edition
description:
The Super Deluxe Edition!

(If the game screen loads all black, try another browser, mine worked in safari but not chrome, idk)

Fancier AND less user friendly! More for looking great than being accessible / playable by kids. But you CAN if you remember these button commands (they're also written above the fireplace, but good luck getting over there without clicking N or Delete first)

G = GO! Start the Promise Ceremony!

X = Hint! Show the Promise text for a second. Keep hammering the X key if you need longer.

Y = Yes! Another girl makes her Promise!

N = No! No more girls left to make their Promise! Time to party!

Backspace/Delete = Reset the hall to the start, press N if it's not letting you run around

OTHER BUTTONS THAT MAKE COOL THINGS HAPPEN: P T M W K S B

Promises made in the Promise simulator are valid if you want them to be, but also if you want to be a Girl Guide, Guides Australia is free to join atm because of the pandemic so, idk, follow your heart.
